tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ar_overlay_information (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  object_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  object_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  overlay_image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
  object_coordinates GEOMETRY NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE AR_Overlay_Info (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    overlay_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    overlay_description TEXT,
    overlay_image_url TEXT,
    ar_object_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE AR_Overlay (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 overlay_name VARCHAR(255),
 overlay_data TEXT,
 overlay_location POINT);

CREATE TABLE Real_World_Object (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 object_name VARCHAR(255),
 object_description TEXT,
 object_location POINT);

CREATE TABLE Spatial_Mapping (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 mapping_name VARCHAR(255),
 mapping_description TEXT,
 mapping_data JSON);

CREATE TABLE spatial_mapping (
    mapping_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    overlay_id UUID NOT NULL,
    object_id UUID NOT NULL,
    mapping_description TEXT,
    mapping_data JSON
);
